item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 30, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Breaking the 4Chan CAPTCHA (262 points | 128 comments)
2. The Quake III Arena Bot (2001) [pdf] (33 points | 12 comments)
3. Brick and Mortar Triangle Fraud (72 points | 32 comments)
4. The Influence of Bell Labs (115 points | 63 comments)
5. What does this button do? – My new car has a mysterious and undocumented switch (306 points | 205 comments)
6. Lessons from 15 Years of Indie App Development (42 points | 6 comments)
7. The Hall SC-VGA-2 Video Processor, the Atari ST and NeXTSTEP (29 points | 6 comments)
8. Googling Is for Old People. That's a Problem for Google (18 points | 6 comments)
9. Understanding SIMD: Infinite complexity of trivial problems (143 points | 55 comments)
10. Jank is now running on LLVM IR (73 points | 13 comments)
11. Everything You Never Wanted to Know About Linker Script (2021) (17 points | 2 comments)
12. NASA's Europa Clipper: Miles Down, Instruments Deploying (59 points | 14 comments)
13. Simple Sabotage for the 21st Century – Specific Suggestions (105 points | 58 comments)
14. Prioritize work at the task level (120 points | 26 comments)
15. Calmy Leon – The Ultimate Relaxing Music and Sound Generator (50 points | 7 comments)
16. How We Got the Lithium-Ion Battery (70 points | 19 comments)
17. Core copyright violation moves ahead in The Intercept's lawsuit against OpenAI (205 points | 194 comments)
18. Chinese pebble-bed nuclear reactor passes "meltdown" test (133 points | 60 comments)
19. Virtual Geometry in Bevy 0.15 (17 points | discuss)
20. Kitagawa Utamaro Japanese Painter (3 points | discuss)
21. Ask HN: Platform for senior devs to learn other programming languages? (63 points | 30 comments)
22. TfL abandons plans for driverless tube trains (26 points | 36 comments)
23. Sol-Ark manufacturer reportedly disables all Deye inverters in the US (71 points | 52 comments)
24. Show HN: Screen Sharing in the Browser (199 points | 42 comments)
25. Summary of "Improvising cellular playgrounds in Realtalk", Aug 2023 [video] (23 points | 2 comments)
26. Show HN: It took me 5() months to build a Plausible alternative (9 points | 11 comments)
27. Sieve (YC W22) Is Hiring Engineers to Build the Future of Video AI ( | hide)
28. Rust: Tools (early access edition) (51 points | 35 comments)
29. Engineers do not get to make startup mistakes when they build ledgers (451 points | 442 comments)
30. The trouble with struct sockaddr's fake flexible array (89 points | 53 comments)
